title: Broken Link Finder Dataset Schema
description: Schema for the dataset output - each record represents a link found on the website

sourceUrl.description: The page URL where the link was found

targetUrl.description: The URL of the link being checked

linkText.description: The anchor text of the link (what users see)

linkType.description: Type of link: internal, external, or resource

status.description: Link status: OK, Broken, Timeout, Not Found, Server Error

isBroken.description: True if the link is broken

severity.description: Issue severity: none, low, medium, high

issueType.description: Specific issue: none, 404, 500, timeout, redirect_loop, invalid_url

errorMessage.description: Detailed error message if link check failed

checkedAt.description: Timestamp when the link was checked
